attributes.long-description:
This Ultimate Edition includes the complete Just Cause 2 game along with all DLC items available:
• Black Market Aerial Pack
• Black Market ‘Boom’ Pack
• Chevalier Ice Breaker
• Monster Truck
• Tuk Tuk Boom Boom
• Bull’s Eye Assault Rifle
• Rico’s Signature Gun
• Chevalier Classic
• Agency Hovercraft
• Chaos Parachute

Experience Just Cause 2's multi-million selling open world gameplay as agent Rico Rodriguez, exploring Panau and its 400 square miles of rugged terrain, plus hundreds of weapons, vehicles and missions.

• UNBELIEVABLE ADRENALINE-FUELLED STUNTS
– Freefall, BASE jump, vehicle surf, parasail, skydive, grapple, slingshot, leap between vehicles, hang from helicopters, scale buildings. The impossible is within your grasp.
• EXPERIENCE TRUE FREEDOM
– Hundreds of objectives can be completed in any way or order that you choose.

1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).

attributes.name: Just Cause 2 Ultimate Edition
